name: Strike Soccer Flick Free Kick
description:
You will feel the pleasure of playing in a real soccer match while playing this game.

With realistic keeper - player, animations, ambiance of a real stadium with cheering and animating fans, you will taste of a real football match on your mobile phone.

Features:

- Enhanced AI with real player and keeper animations
- 3 different game modes
- Sensitive ball flick and spinning control
- Stunning graphics and sounds, high scores and much more...
